Response: I thought the way the class was handled made it easy for me to relate. I know the work may be challenging but I'm quite optimistic about the class. Thanks!
One improvement could be to allow for the TAs to handle some of the questions.
I liked that there will be plenty of support. Basically, that was made clear and also the general layout of the course. I look forward to learning how to analyze data at a higher level.

I thought that the general overview of the course schedule and expectations was clear and helpful. Next time, I think it could be helpful to briefly address examples of what kinds of things we'll be going over in the course (particularly examples of final project topics). Thanks!

I liked that the expectations of the class were clearly explained and that the instructors are all very willing to help us learn the class material. I liked the idea of the Application sections. I liked the explanation about the growth mindset.
The pace was great, I liked that there were a lot of quant details provided (# of assignments, time they would be do, reviewing homework grading policy, etc.).

The professor and teaching staff are clearly enthusiastic (and enthusiasm is contagious - I'm excited too!). However, attending 2 sections per week seems like a lot. How much are the Thursday sections (application sections) recommended? Could those be discussed a little more during the next class?
I think this was a good first introduction to the course. Although some people may not think it's helpful, I appreciated having a walk-through / explanation of the course logistics and expectations.
I liked the explanation of "why R" and introduction to visualization and what R is good for. Everything seemed organized and accessible - excited to really get started and see what's next!

I appreciated when you gave us time to discuss things in small groups and then talk about them as a full lecture. Specifically, when we were going through the plots and looking at what was wrong with each one.

Really helpful to understand the arc of the course. I'm eager to learn more about the specific statistical concepts we'll be learning, but I know those are available in the book and will be covered in classes to come. I'm also looking forward to seeing guidelines for and examples of final projects so that I can start brainstorming about possible ideas.
Clear outline of the class. Good intro set up for the next lecture. I would like more information on the project scope and ideas to start thinking about it.
I enjoyed the moments where we got to chat with the people sitting next to us. I think today's class provided a good beginning foundation for what the class will be.
The class was well structured! It felt very engaging for a syllabus day. Not sure I have any particular advice for next year.
The part on the value of visualization, with examples, was interesting :)
Good music. Definitely appreciate having clear timeline of deadlines. Also appreciate clear expectations for HW and projects as early as possible.
Good pace of questions throughout the tutorial. It would be good to review concerns about preparedness in taking the course.
I liked your emphasis on teaching and transparency of your process.

I liked the syllabus. I'm really looking forward to learning all these interesting tools to use them in my research. I get distracted when people eat in class and I'd appreciate it if the rule "no food or drinks" could be respected
I liked the way statistics and its importance/how cool it can be was discussed and introduced, especially addressing the fear that often surrounds this subject. No thoughts for improvement!
maybe cover more actual materials (even in the first class) because the quarter is short
I really enjoyed the introduction to the course, as it seems very organized and focused on student growth. I'm excited to start discussing the course content.
Tobi is cheerful, positive, and non-judgmental-seeming :) looking fwd to the course!
I like all the organization and effort you've put into the class and obvious care you have for our learning. Thank you!
It was good. Maybe spend a few more minutes to discuss the final project
Very clear presentation of how the course is going to be.
I think this class will be completely different from future classes because this was just an intro. I don't have much feedback for this class.
I thought it was a great introduction to the class, great laying out of what we are going to learn, why it is important, and what the class resources are.
very friendly atmosphere. Very clear slides. Exciting content! Can't wait to learn
It felt very organized which was nice.  Don't really have anything that could be improved.
Clear expectations/schedule/goals for class! I like the music too
Would have appreciated more detail on the project. When are we expected to form groups?
It was good- standard first class.
Good and informative, feeling good about the rest of the class, thanks for the resources + super organized class guide. I think the discussion of class logistics was a bit long and could be cut down
It was a great first class!!
So far so good!
I like the feedback mechanism built into the course.
Good in general.
